label: I-26 Photo 1040
description: Virginia-Carolina Chemical Corp. property with railroad tracks and utility poles, on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). On or in vicinity of King Street Extn. Billboard for Miller High Life beer on property. Surveyor notations on back of photo: "Dkt.: 10.490. Property owner: V.C. Chemical Co. Tract: 1. Date: September 11, 1962. Panoramic view of VC Chemical Complex. Taken from north side. (See plans for location.) (For information only.)" [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
